Action.author: cintel
Action.body: If a single validator gets an invalid batch, but then doesn't receive a batch for some time, it will repeatedly go through the process of verifying the batch. Here is a link to a diff that can recreate the problem while running intkey-smoke that was posted to Rocketchat: https://chat.hyperledger.org/file-upload/Aq5gq6tFvq9Wy2cNj/causes_repeats.txt.
